turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order some pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what pizza restaurant?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Joeys Pizzaeria!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that works for me, i know where that is

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of pizzas do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a couple pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what are they?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a small pizza with chicken on it and a small with bacon and ziti on it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great i will order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay let me know

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately they are out of ziti

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay can u get pepparoni instead

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a small pizza with chicken and a small pizza with bacon and pepparoni?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes that works for me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i am ordering them right now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they are ordered and willbe ready in 25 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome
